name: cash-flow
description: ## Get inventory view and everyday cash analysis

scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" " cd server && npm run start:dev "
scripts.build: npm i && cd server && npm i
scripts.start:prod: concurrently  "cp -R ./client/build ./server/react  " "cd server && npm run build && npm run start:prod"
scripts.start:con: concurrently "cd server && echo n &&  npm run start:console:staging"
